https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/sVwmFgDpgj9rRh2o5Snk931RLwm.jpg In a mystical land torn apart by civil war, a warrior princess must team up with a rival warrior prince to hunt down an evil sorcerer who has summoned a giant flying demon which is terrorizing their land. Attack of the Gryphon
